name: Employee Of The Month (itch)
description: Ever wondered how things are in the afterlife? Well not so different as it turns out. In the offices of Life Co. all employees want to impress the boss and get that sweet sweet bonus. In 'Employee of the Month' you can play with up to 4 players in a fast-paced game full of competitive and fun challenges, where you can beat your opponents without fighting. Who said that work couldn't also be fun? Players need to pass the boss to other players in order to paint the office in their colours before work hours end. Time's a-ticking! Collect various power-ups to give yourself an edge or to hinder your opponent. At the end of the day, the person who holds the most tiles becomes the employee of the month!
